trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property that can be assigned to a long-running <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> 개체에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> 장기 실행에 할당 될 수 있는 속성 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 에 대 한 처리기는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [개체 컨텍스트 수명 주기 관리 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variable of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object and its assignment to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 생성은 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 의 변수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> 개체 및 해당 할당을는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> that is used by the data source.
The object context that is used by the data source.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property can be assigned to a long-running <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> 장기 실행 속성을 지정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 에 대 한 처리기는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [개체 컨텍스트 수명 주기 관리 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variable of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object and its assignment to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 생성은 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 의 변수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> 개체 및 해당 할당을는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> 개체입니다.
